text: Eric B. Knox (Ph.D., University of Michigan, 1993) is a Research Scientist at the Indiana University Biology Department and the Director of the Indiana University Herbarium where he optimizes laboratory protocols and studies the flora of Indiana. == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:University of Michigan alumni Category:Indiana University faculty Category:Botanists active in Africa Category:21st-century American botanists
title: Eric B. Knox
